Digital One Health Workshop

Date: 13-14 September 2023
Location: Admas Grand Hotel, Entebbe, Uganda

Overview

This workshop will bring together AMR stakeholders from various institutions across the One Health spectrum in Uganda to engage in discussions towards an integrated and interoperable AMR surveillance workflows. These discussions will form the foundation of a recommendations paper to develop a data-sharing framework for One Health decision-making.

Admas Grand Hotel, Entebbe

Day 1

Time Session Who
11:00 Welcome and introduction to Digital One Health Adrian Muwonge

13:30 CPHL, NADDEC and MWE AMR Surveillance Workflows
(5 minutes each, followed by discussions)		 Ritah Namusoosa, Joel Bazira, Esther Nabatta, Michael Omodo, Judith Namumbya
14:00 Metadata Hackathon Everyone
15:15 Afternoon break Everyone
15:45 Digital One Health showcase (Bodastage) Emmanuel Ssebagala
16:30 African Pathogen Data sharing and archive Gerald Mboowa
17:00 Forum Everyone
17:30 END Everyone

Time Session Who
09:00 Future planning Everyone
10:30 Morning break Everyone
11:00 Workshop recap with Representatives of CPHL, NADDEC and MWE Everyone
12:15 Summary and Wrap-up Everyone
13:00 Lunch Everyone
14:00 END Everyone
